about.name: Maria Elheeb
about.bio: I’m a third-year Computer Science student at Tel Hai College and a passionate full-stack developer. I love crafting pixel-perfect UIs with React and Material UI, building robust APIs with Node.js and Express, and deploying scalable apps in the cloud.

education.notes: GPA 72; coursework in Algorithms, Operating Systems, and Automata Theory

experience.description: Mentored a young student weekly, designing collaborative activities and supporting academic growth.
Built a React/Node.js web app for movie search, favorites, and admin panel using OMDB & YouTube APIs.

about.name: Yazan Dawud
about.bio: I’m a software engineer specializing in building performant, scalable backends with Node.js and Express, and crafting smooth front-end experiences with React.

education.notes: Focused on distributed systems and real-time applications

experience.description: Developed RESTful services and integrated WebSocket features for live data updates.
Created a collaborative to-do app with Socket.IO, React frontend, and MongoDB.
